attributes.description:
Welcome to Cars.Com2, where we sell reliable cars in all price ranges. We aim to provide you with exceptional service, sound financial advice and affordable quality. All our customers can expect the very highest standards of sales and service excellence. Visit our Full Range of vehicles at Please note, advertised sales prices does not include License and Registration fees, nor Dealer Admin Fees.


At our Branch we are proud to introduce for sale this immaculate 2014 Bmw 118i 5DR A/T (F20). It features, Aircon, Power Steering, Airbags, Radio/CD, Leather seats, Multifunction Steering, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Cruise Control, Central Locking, PDC and Mags.


Nation Wide Delivery 15 years successful track record, trusted dealer with a selection of 50 cars under one roof. First payment in 60 days Everybody knows that Cars.Com2 rules MOTOR TOWN. Enquire now for friendly, professional, efficient and fast service. Its easy to do business with Cars.Com2.

attributes.description: THIS ONE IS SOMETHING VERY SPECIAL INDEED 20 out of 10 full service history, EVERY SINGLE SERVICE COMPLETED ON SCHEDULE AND UP TO DATE INCLUDING SERVICE RECENTLY COMPLETED AT MERCEDES BENZ. absolutely spotless condition, Cashmere Silver Metallic, Black Leather Upholstery is like new and finished with Light Oak Fine Wood grain Trim, Glass Sun Roof. THE MOST IMPRESSIVE COMBINATION FOR A CLS, Fully Loaded with every other extra imaginable including Voice Command Professional Satellite Navigation, Parktronic Front and Rear, Automatic BiXenon Headlights WITH CORNERING FUNCTION Rain Sensor, LUXURY ELECTRIC MEMORY SEATS WITH SEAT HEATING FUNCTION Thermatronic Automatic Climate Control, HARMON KARDON SOUND, Multi Functional Sport Leather Steering, MBENZ Blue Tooth Connectivity Package, Auto Armor Smash and Grab Safety Film etc. Just so soft and smooth to drive Very rare opportunity to OWN MBENZS FLAGSHIP SALOON with good mileage and comprehensive history FOR LESS MONEY THAN A NEW POLO VIVO THIS IS BY FAR THE CLEANEST CLS IN SA Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
